page.title: 04Housing
page.content: There are roughly 100 houses on Coll. 34% are privately owned.25% are holiday homes and are only used about two weeks a year.About 15% are rented by the Laird and Dr De Vries.There are 14 council houses known as Carnan Road. Coll at the moment is being consided for a Housing Action Area in order to improve standards.There are two churches on Coll, a hotel and a guest house.Most of the houses on Coll have a decent sized piece of land with them.The doctor's house belongs to Argyll and Clyde Health Board. Most houses on Coll are fixed up with a telephone and electricity. Houses in and around Arinagour are linked to the main water supply. Those outside either have their own well or a water storage system.
